Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The incidence of hypokalemia was lower with VAL / HCTZ combinations ( 1 . 8 % - 6 . 1 % ) than with HCTZ monotherapies ( 7 . 1 % - 13 . 3 % ) .

Let's think step by step.

There are no explicit chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph. The paragraph only mentions the names of two drug combinations: VAL / HCTZ and HCTZ monotherapies. VAL is assumed to represent the drug "Valsartan" and HCTZ represents "Hydrochlorothiazide". Therefore, the table would look like this:

| Chemical                   |
|---------------------------|
| Valsartan (VAL)           |
| Hydrochlorothiazide (HCTZ) |
